original_solution_mapping.L1: In 10 years, Kilee will be 20 years + 10 years = 30 years.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In ten years, Cornelia will be 3 * 30 years = <<3*30=90>>90 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Cornelia is currently 90 years - 10 years = <<90-10=80>>80 years old

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5685.
    Returns: Cornelia's current age.
    """
    # L1
    kilee_current_age = 20 # Kilee is currently 20 years old
    years_in_future = 10 # In 10 years
    kilee_age_in_future = kilee_current_age + years_in_future

    # L2
    age_multiplier = 3 # three times as old
    cornelia_age_in_future = age_multiplier * kilee_age_in_future

    # L3
    cornelia_current_age = cornelia_age_in_future - years_in_future

    # FA
    answer = cornelia_current_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Kilee will be {kilee_current_age} years + {years_in_future} years = {kilee_age_in_future} years.
In ten years, Cornelia will be {age_multiplier} * {kilee_age_in_future} years = <<{age_multiplier}*{kilee_age_in_future}={cornelia_age_in_future}>>{cornelia_age_in_future} years old.
Cornelia is currently {cornelia_age_in_future} years - {years_in_future} years = <<{cornelia_age_in_future}-{years_in_future}={cornelia_current_age}>>{cornelia_current_age} years old

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In 10 years, Kilee will be 20 years + 10 years = 30 years.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In ten years, Cornelia will be 3 * 30 years = <<3*30=90>>90 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Cornelia is currently 30 years - 10 years = <<30-10=20>>20 years old

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'kilee_age_in_future' (value: 30) was used instead of 'cornelia_age_in_future' (value: 90).
